Text:
I am interrogated in a room comparable to a detention
cell as a suspect in the kidnapping of Princess
Alexia.
Still haven't had enough, you scum?
We know you did it.

I'll ask you on more time: where did you hide
Princess Alexia?

(I can tolerate physical pain, but something else
rattles me...)

Why not do us all a favor and confess? You're
only prolonging the inevitable.

The sooner you come clean, the sooner the pain will
all be over.
Agh...!

(These men have captured the essence of a truly
stereotypical interrogation!)

(I can't afford to be outdone by their intense
dedication to these tropes!)

I say it's time we use more creative methods to turn
up the pain. Heheh...

I don't know anything! I really don't! Pleeease!
You've gotta believe meeee!
Aaaaghhh!!!

(Hehe... Who's the more convincing background
character now?)
Fess up, you bastard!
Aghhhh! Pl-Please...just spare my life...
Begging for your life now, are we?
Think you're the first to grovel like that?

(Yup, pulled off that pathetic plea for mercy
flawlessly!)
(Anyway...)
(How long is this gonna go on for?)

I'm sure they're already looking for me—my sister
too, probably...

I'll have a hard time staying alive if you take too
much blood. I'm not ready to die, you know.

Hehehe... I-I know. I want all the blood you can
give me. I'll siphon it from you bit by bit.
Yes, please do.

As long as he needs her blood, he won't kill her.
Which is why she keeps docile and doesn't try to
resist.

For the time being, she decides to wait to be rescued
instead.

Th-Th-This wasn't supposed to happen. I blame those
morons for all this.
Uh-huh, I hate idiots, too.

She stares at the man in the white coat as she
mumbles under her breath, "Because dealing
with them wears me out."

They destroyed my...my laboratory. And then they kept
coming and coming and—Aaaghh!
That's a shame. I'm sorry to hear that.
Yes! Yes, it is! M-My research was almost doneeee!

I-I-If I don't finish it soon, I-I'll be banished...
Banished...!
That sounds terrible.

C-Curse it all! Damn it, damn it, damn it, damn it,
damn it! That good-for-nothing...nothing!

The man in the white coat approaches the chained
creature and kicks it.

He kicks it over and over, stomping on its body as
the creature all but keeps still, huddling into
itself.
Weren't you going to take my blood?

Oh, right. Right. With your blood... With your blood,
everything will be complete.
That's great.
With your blood... blood, blood...
Oh! I forgot.
What is that?
Your blood is decreasing. I forgot to feed you.
Ulp...
Heh, heh-heh-heh!
Lady Alpha!
What's wrong?

Someone has kidnapped Princess Alexia, and the Knight
Order has arrested Master Shadow as a suspect!
What?!
We must send out a rescue party immediately!
Wait!
B-But—!

Calm down, Beta. Do you think he'd let the Knight
Order arrest him without reason?
No... I don't.

Wherever they may have taken him, I'm certain he
could easily escape if he wanted. If we act now, we
may interfere with his plans.
Ngh... True.

I understand your worry. I'm tempted to rush to his
rescue as well... But that shouldn't be our priority.
No, we should be to get to the bottom of this.

Let's put our trust in him. Come to think of it, he
has been acting rather odd of late.

He's been cozying up to that sleazy woman... I mean,
Princess Alexia.

The fact that she was kidnapped must mean he was on
to something.
That would be the natural conclusion.

Princess Alexia...and her royal blood... I'm guessing
the Cult is involved.
I also have my suspicions about the Knight Order.

Let's launch another investigation into the Cult's
hideout and the Knight Order. We'll also have
Delta track Alexia's scent.
Understood! I'll gather everyone immediately!

We'll do our part—that's the best we can do to meet
his expectations.
